General.Name: Sinolink Securities Co Ltd
General.Description: Sinolink Securities Co., Ltd. provides investment banking and securities brokerage services in China. The company offers brokerage services. It provides investment banking services; fixed income services; asset management services; and investment advisory services, as well as derivatives. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Chengdu City, China.

4.Name: Mr. Hong Gang  Zhou
4.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors, Director of Board Office & GM of Gen. Affairs Dept.
